import React, { Fragment, useState } from 'react' // import { setAlert } from '../../action/alert'; import propTypes from 'prop-types' import { connect } from 'react-redux'; const AddBus = ({ }) => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ vehicleNo: "", busName: "", seats: 0, busType: "", agency:" ", seatCategory: "", policy: "", image:[], from: "", to: "", arrivalTime: "", departureTime: "" }) const { vehicleNo, busName, seats, busType, seatCategory, policy, image, from, to, arrivalTime, departureTime, } = formData const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (to === from) { alert("can't Add same start and end city", "danger"); } else{ console.log({ busName, vehicleNo, seats, busType, seatCategory, policy, from, to, arrivalTime, departureTime }) } } const pushDays = function (e){ const data = [e.target.value] console.log(data) } const onChange = e => setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); return (
onSubmit(e)}>
onChange(e)} placeholder="Enter Bus Name" />
onChange(e)} placeholder="Enter Vehicle No" />
onChange(e)} placeholder="Enter the seats 10"/>

onChange(e)} placeholder="Enter sleeper or semi sleeper" />
onChange(e)} placeholder="Enter the policy" />
onchange(e.target.value)} placeholder="Enter the link of the image" />
